titleStmt.title: By the Lord Lieutenant. Ormonde. Whereas the present Parliament is adjourned until the five and twentieth day of this present May: ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Crook, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty; and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer, next door to the Bear and Ragged-staffe in Castle-street,

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
At end: Given at His Majesties Castle of Dublin the 21th day of May, 1663. God save the King.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: Samuel Dancer, next door to the Bear
